2 HTML5 Resources I Like

Video For Everybody!

A simple block of code for properly implementing the HTML5 tag. It includes detection code, thumbnail placeholder tag and is heavily commented so you know how things work. Best of all, there’s are detailed notes on HTML5 video at the end. One of the best HTML5-related resources out right now. (Sitelink»)

HTML5 Doctor

Lots great tutorials and code snippets. Also includes a update of Eric Meyer’s famous CSS Reset that’s rewritten for HTML5 (get that here). Lots of useful stuff. (Sitelink»)

Both sites have been added to the “Coding Sites” section on my sidebar.
